channel.title: Paying 1m for assist with setup
channel.description:
Well to be honest rs2 autos are nothing the same as sbot and sts from the rsc days. Im fully not understanding how to set up rs2 autos an Ive just come back to rs and had enough of clicking. Pretty much willing to pay 1m cash to anyone that will assist me how to set up scar and srl from start to finish just so that i can powermine. (wanting to get 85 mining).
If your interested add me at james_shaw_nz@hotmail.com
Cheers James

item.title: Paying 1m for assist with setup

item.description:
@omg_omg_omg wrote:

Don’t pay 1m, just ask someone who isn’t greedy.

item.title: Paying 1m for assist with setup
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

Dude, it is so easy.

All you need to do is download SCAR & SRL, open SCAR (read the Getting Started Wizard), follow the directions specified in the script, click on the green arrow, fill out the forms (if they are there), or otherwise just watch the script perform.

SCAR & SRL can be downloaded from here.

If you need any more help, post back.

Read full topic
